China growth target achievable if backed by more stimulus, analysts sayChina's 5% economic growth target for 2024 announced this week is ambitious and can be achieved if backed by further stimulus measures in monetary, fiscal and regulatory policy, analysts said. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 15:14:07 GMT 6MZ5H22DTZO7DLXFBQNI5JMXKE https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/china-growth-target-achievable-if-backed-by-more-stimulus-analysts-say-2024-03-07/Anisha Sircar市场亚洲市场
Gold surge could dull India wedding season demand; China outlook robustA surge in global gold prices to record highs could dampen consumption during the wedding season in India, but top buyer China will see robust safe-haven demand this year, analysts and traders said. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 14:28:16 GMT VUA7YNGPHFM57PHLANHMP2JETE https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/gold-surge-could-dull-india-wedding-season-demand-china-outlook-robust-2024-03-07/Ashitha Shivaprasad, Rajendra Jadhav市场商品
US threatens action against Iran at IAEA over continued 'stonewalling'The United States on Thursday threatened future action against Iran at the U.N. nuclear watchdog if Tehran keeps "stonewalling" the watchdog by denying it the cooperation and answers it seeks on issues including long-unexplained uranium traces. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 12:54:15 GMT AVGMZ5LLKFPFTFDROZTIVJEEM https://www.reuters.com/world/us-threatens-action-against-iran-iaea-over-continued-stonewalling-2024-03-07/Francois Murphy世界
China interference in Lithuania polls 'can't be ruled out', says security chiefChinese interference in this year's elections in EU and NATO member Lithuania "definitely cannot be ruled out" due to Lithuanian support for Taiwan, the chief of Lithuania’s counter-intelligence said on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:31:32 GMT B3OXQQWJ4NONJFJVOBQ2AEJAS4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china-interference-lihuania-polls-cant-be-ruled-out-says-security-chief-2024-03-07/Andrius Sytas世界
UN data: Global patent filings drop nearly 2% as innovation faltersPatent filings slipped last year by nearly 2% in the first fall in 14 years amid economic uncertainty, the U.N. patent agency said on Thursday, in a move it described as "concerning". Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:29:10 GMT JG3NZUKOIZP3LI362NOADQZLNU https://www.reuters.com/world/un-data-global-patent-filings-drop-nearly-2-innovation-falters-2024-03-07/Reuters世界
Indian government panel backs higher carbon tax on coal importsA panel of officials from Indian ministries has called for a bigger carbon tax on higher quality imported coal while cutting rates for domestic coal, in a bid to slash shipments of the polluting fuel, the coal ministry said on Thursday. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:17:29 GMT 5CVWMAPCINOMDOO4PSGLQHFGTI https://www.reuters.com/world/india/indian-government-panel-backs-higher-carbon-tax-coal-imports-2024-03-07/Sudarshan Varadhan可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
Morning Bid: Brighter mood as ECB meets, yen knocks NikkeiA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:08:48 GMT OGNMNSETYJOFRKYJNWNB3J4L7E https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-03-07/Reuters市场美国市场
New push in Congress to ban TikTok or force Chinese divestiture gains steamThe U.S. House Committee on Energy and Commerce on Thursday is expected to vote on legislation giving China's ByteDance six months to divest from short video app TikTok or face a U.S. ban. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 11:02:45 GMT 76D576RYEZNSVG2SPX4UAURVFY https://www.reuters.com/technology/new-push-congress-ban-tiktok-or-force-chinese-divestiture-gains-steam-2024-03-07/David Shepardson技术
Kashmir has been transformed, Indian PM says on first visit in five yearsThe Himalayan region of Jammu and Kashmir has been transformed and integrated with the rest of India, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said on Thursday, crediting the change to his government's contentious decision to revoke its special status. Thu, 07 Mar 2024 10:22:50 GMT QDJBJOJGXBP2BLM4C5B3XRZAQY https://www.reuters.com/world/india/kashmir-has-been-transformed-indian-pm-says-first-visit- Five-years-2024-03-07/Sharafat Ali, Rajesh Prabhuswamy世界印度
Top official from China's Xinjiang says 'Sinicisation' of Islam 'inevitable'Xinjiang's top Communist Party official said on Thursday that the "Sinicisation" of Islam in the Muslim-majority region in northwestern China, where Beijing is accused of human rights abuses, is "inevitable". Thu, 07 Mar 2024 10:16:07 GMT XLARL7MJUZN5JFVR67IMEF45U4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/top-official-chinas-xinjian-says-sinicization-islam-inevitable-2024-03-07/Laurie Chen世界中国
Hong Kong pushes new security bill at full speed, citing 'imminent' risksThe Hong Kong government will send the "Article 23" national security bill to the legislature on Friday, possibly cracking down further on dissent in the former British colony, with city leader John Lee calling for it to be passed "at full speed". Thu, 07 Mar 2024 09:30:30 GMT LVQP6D7ME5PTHFKCUWYBQBMBI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/hong-kong-submit-new-national-security-bill-legislature-this-week-2024-03-07/James Pomfret, Jessie Pang世界亚太地区
